meta.title: Calamari
meta.description: Calamari is a parachain on Kusama that will be bridged to Polkadot. It will be a cross-chain DeFi hub, with a focus on stablecoins and derivatives.

title: Calamari
description: Calamari is a parachain on Kusama that will be bridged to Polkadot. It will be a cross-chain DeFi hub, with a focus on stablecoins and derivatives.
